prompts: Create a cute, quadruped Pokemon with a blue and purple color scheme and large ears.
Generate a small, playful creature that has a bright color palette and sharp features.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a small mammal with a vibrant body covered in spots.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and has a friendly and curious demeanor.
Design a creature with a unique body shape and bright colors, perfect for a forest habitat.
Make a Pokemon that has a blend of blue and white tones, with distinct ear shapes.
Give me a Pokemon that has a playful personality and is often found in urban settings.
